content:
Downvoted :(

I don't think a COC should have a duplicate in classic puzzles , this makes solutions copyable from one another plus the time frame to do this might be a bit extensive for some newcomers which does not fit right into the 15-minute interval mark.

--> https://www.codingame.com/training/easy/sudoku-validator 

This one should be removed for the record ...
I agree on the 10 mins. Reverse should be ok for most of us, sudoku is such a popular game ;)
10 mins could be better suited for this problem; not sure about the pertinence of the reverse mode here.
